name: Ramona's Apricot Brownies
author: Ramona Glastetter
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter over low heat, stirring constantly until all of chocolate is melted. Remove from heat; stir in brown sugar, eggs and vanilla until blended. Set aside. In another bowl, mix flour, baking powder and salt. Stir in chocolate mixture. Combine apricots, almonds, and coconut; stir half into the batter. Pour into a greased 9-inch square baking pan. Sprinkle remaining apricot mixture on top. Bake at 350Â° for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Cool.
